definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: For these, it is essential that coordination for data types takes place.
sentences.chinese: 對於這些組件，保持數據類型的一致性是非常重要的。

sentences.english: Creates loose couplings between the client components and the services they use.
sentences.chinese: 在客戶端組件和它們所使用的服務之間建立了松耦合。

sentences.english: Then, choose the persistence mapper component.
sentences.chinese: 然後，選擇持久性映射程序組件。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the security of the strong-named assembly would be compromised.
sentences.chinese: 否則，此強式名稱組件的安全性將受到威脅。

sentences.english: The assembly further comprises a test sensor being coupled to the sensor support.
sentences.chinese: 該組件另外包括與傳感器支持物聯接的檢驗傳感器。

sentences.english: Components that are changed together should be grouped into one module.
sentences.chinese: 應該將一起進行更改的組件分組到一個模塊中。

sentences.english: After the individual components were graphed, it was easy to spot this problem.
sentences.chinese: 在對各個組件繪製圖表之後，很容易確定此問題。

sentences.english: The tool is comprised of four key components that enable you to achieve these results.
sentences.chinese: 該工具由四個能夠讓您得到這些結果的關鍵組件組成。

sentences.english: These components provide general utility functions.
sentences.chinese: 這些組件提供普通的實用功能。

sentences.english: I found a serious bug in my add-on, and I really want to get the fix up there quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我的附加組件已經發布，用戶看上去很喜歡。

sentences.english: All needle valves must be closed on test kit.
sentences.chinese: 檢測組件上的所有針形閥都必須關閉。

sentences.english: You can create reusable custom components by extending this class.
sentences.chinese: 通過擴展此類可以創建可重用的定製組件。

sentences.english: The third component, mediations, contributes to the separation of concerns.
sentences.chinese: 第三種組件，中介，有助於分離業務。

sentences.english: Each manager is responsible for creating and managing the life cycle of the components they create.
sentences.chinese: 每種管理器都負責創建和管理所創建組件的生命週期。

sentences.english: Assemblies provide additional monitoring points at the component interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 程序集在組件接口上提供了額外的監視點。

sentences.english: Nafion membranes have been most widely used as a PEM in fuel cells.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種製作燃料電池膜電極組件的新方法。

definition: to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
